Hello laik. Welcome to CodeFx!

The C++ examples in this project are built upon Visual C++ in Visual Studio.

What do you want to add? If you have any requests of examples, please feel free to post the description here. As long as it is a frequently asked and tested scenario (e.g. Use ADO in C++, or write shell extension), we will add the example within one week.

Thanks!
